update account
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
member_id = #{memberId},
money = #{money},
description = #{description},
type_id = #{typeId},
id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from account where category_id = #{categoryId} and family_id = #{familyId}

SELECT CASE WHEN #{groupType} = 'year' THEN DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%Y') WHEN #{groupType} = 'month' THEN DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%Y-%m') WHEN #{groupType} = 'week' THEN CONCAT(YEAR(record_date), '-W', WEEK(record_date, 1)) WHEN #{groupType} = 'day' THEN DATE_FORMAT(record_date, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS time,
SUM(CASE WHEN type_id = 0 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS income, SUM(CASE WHEN type_id = 1 THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS expense
FROM account WHERE record_date BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} And family_id = #{familyId} GROUP BY time ORDER BY time ASC
